Yourfaitlz] By saith here he means the profession of the Christian religion, which the Colossians had embraced, through the ministry and preaching of Epaphras and others; not indeed the external profession of saith alone, but an internal and sincere faith dwelling in the heart: for by the rule of charity, the latter is always to be presumed in the former, unless hypocrisy and impiety be discovered to evince the contrary. ‚

He places this faith in the foreground, and puts it before other spiritual gifts, because it is in its nature prior to the rest.
